ModMetaData.name: RimMind
ModMetaData.author: RimMind Team
ModMetaData.description:
RimMind integrates AI intelligence into your colony via OpenRouter. Features an in-game AI chat companion that can query your colony's state using 26 different tools - colonists, resources, research, defense, and more. The AI advisor knows everything about your colony and can help you make decisions.
Configure your OpenRouter API key in mod settings to get started.
